Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
UI: Make unassigned guests header sticky and add resizable divider

- Restructure unassigned section with fixed label on left side
- Add draggable divider between unassigned guests and dorms sections

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Feature: Add click-to-pick guest assignment in Timeline View

- Add click-to-pick mode as alternative to drag-and-drop
- Click on a guest blob to "pick" it (shows yellow highlight)
- Click on a bed cell to place the picked guest
- Press Escape or click same guest to cancel pick
- Use shared singleton state for pick state across components
- Stop click propagation to prevent immediate placement

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

EOF
)")

Bash(git merge feature/xlsx-export --no-ff -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Merge feature/xlsx-export: Add Excel export functionality

Features:
- Export Timeline view as Excel with beds as rows, dates as columns
- Export Assignments view with all guest details and room assignments
- Merged cells for guest stay periods with medium borders
- Thin gray grid lines between all cells
- Alternating white/gray backgrounds between rooms
- Dormitory colors on first 5 columns
- Full guest names (preferredName/firstName + lastName)
- Dates formatted with 4-digit years (MM/DD/YYYY)
- Summary and Unassigned sheets included

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
